revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: "(Column) 64:;Sisois, son of Petheus (Aphrodas, son of Pkas);;orchard taxes for the 12th year apomoira drachmas 2 obols 3, tax on the produce of olives obols 2 chalki 2, naubion obol 1.5, surcharges obols 3.5 chalki 2;;(in left margin: drachmas 12 obols 9) eparourion drachma 1 obols 4, surcharges obol 1, kollybos obol 0.5 chalki 2, in total drachmas 5 obols 4 chalki 2;;geometria for the 12th year drachmas 6 obols 1.5, surcharge obols 2.5, in total drachmas 6 obols 4;;Kepalas, son of Anchorymphis (Nausis);;(in left margin: obols 27) geometria for the 12th year drachmas 3 obol 0.5 chalki 2, surcharges obol 1 chalki 2, in total drachmas 3 obols 2;;in total for the day drachmas 140 obols 25;;(Pachon) 16 likewise:;Theabennis, son of Harphaesis, grandson of Theabennis, mother Thaesis, copper tetradrachmas 4;;Satabous, son of Petheus, grandson of Satabous, mother Tapetaus, drachmas 4;;Sabeinos, son of Pasoknopaios, grandson of Horos, mother Tapetheus, drachmas 4;;Petoraipis, son of Hatres, grandson of Imouthes, mother Soeris, drachmas 4;;Mysthes, son of Teberis, grandson of Sambathion, mother Isidora, drachmas 4;;Esouris, son of Petheus, grandson of Akousilaos, mother Ptolema, drachmas 4;;Harpagathes, son of Satabous, grandson of Anchophis, mother Sambathion, obols 28;;Lucius Longinus Gemellus;;bath tax drachmas 28;;Psenesis, son of Parmenion, grandson of Psenesis, mother Tkonnos, drachmas 4;;Papeis, fatherless, mother Thaesis, drachmas 4;;Orsenouphis, son of Petheus, grandson of Horion, mother Tapetheus, copper tetradrachmas 4;;Petaus, son of Petheus, grandson of Petaus, mother Tapasion, drachmas 4;;in total for the day drachmas 80, obols 28.;(Pachon) 17 likewise:;Komon, son of Pnepheros, grandson of Satabous, mother Tkollauthis, drachmas 8;;Priskos alias Pasoxis, son of Satabous, grandson of Pnepheros, mother Thermouthis, drachmas 4;;Herakles, son of Apollonios, grandson of Petoraipis, mother Tapetheus, drachmas 4, obols 28;;Harpagathes, son of Pnepheros, grandson of Pekmeis, mother Tapetheus, drachmas 8;;Ptolemaios, his son, mother Thaesis, drachmas 8;;Kastor, son of Onnophris, grandson of Maron, mother Tkollainis, drachmas 16, obols 26;;Heras alias Petheus, son of Aphrodisios, grandson of Petheus, mother Isidora, drachmas 24;;Onnophris, son of Pnepheros, grandson of Phanomgeus, mother Tapetheus, copper tetradrachmas 4;;in total for the day drachmas 88, obols 23.;(Pachon) 18 likewise:;Tasoucharion, daughter of Apollonios (Harpakysis);;(in left margin: drachmas 100) orchard taxes for the 12th year apomoira drachmas 43 obols 4.5, tax on the produce of olives drachmas 6 obol 1.5, naubion drachmas 4 obols 2.5, surcharges drachmas 10 obols 5.5;;eparourion drachmas 29 [obol 1], surcharges drachmas 2 obols 2.5 chalki 2, kollybos drachma 1 obols 4, in total drachmas 98 obols 3.5 chalki 2;;naubion of katoikoi for the 13th year obols 3, surcharges obol 0.5, kollybos chalki 2, in total obols 3.5 chalki 2;;Athenion, son of Horos, grandson of Pakysis, mother Heras, drachmas 8;;Kastresis, slave of Thaisarion alias Nebsosis, copper tetradrachmas 4."

listBibl.bibl: Rep Editor - Pearl OM; Rep Ser. - Diss; 1938; pg. 9 - 10 Youtie HC, PMich IV, 1, 224, 1937 -- CPJ 3, 492 (lines with Sambathion) Pearl OM - Youtie HC, PMich IV, 357 C, D, 1939
